great picture quality but terrible audio. I tried using equaliser etc. but whatever you do, the speech is always difficult to hear so have to put it on loud, but then when there's a loud bit of action it blasts far too loudly so have to mess around turning volume back down again.

This seems to be on many of YIFY's rips, I'm NOT ungrateful and for the file size the image quality is always great but I now look around for appx. 3-4gb size files for proper audio.

AUDIO VOICE PROBLEM and how to fix it.

Write to the people making the dam movies or producing the DVD's.

I have ripped hundreds of DVD's myself and whilst I only upload a few things myself due to bandwidth, I find too many movies where the background music just drowns the shit out of the voices.  Dammed annoying trend that has appeared  the last 10 years or so.  

For those that find the volume overall on some movies is lower than other stuff especially lower than TV series then try tweaking your

AC3 Filter

You can boost the volume there which may help with overall low volume but not low voice volume verses back ground sound.
